option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/white" /> <corners android:radius="16dp" /> <stroke android:width="1dp" android:color="#E0E0E0" /> </shape>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/white" /> <corners android:radius="16dp" /> <stroke android:width="1dp" android:color="#E0E0E0" /> </shape>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <gradient android:startColor="#00E676" android:endColor="#2979FF" android:angle="135" /> <corners android:bottomLeftRadius="24dp" android:bottomRightRadius="24dp" /> </shape>

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24"> <path android:fillColor="#FFFFFF" android:pathData="M20,11H7.83l5.59-5.59L12,4l-8,8 8,8 1.41-1.41L7.83,13H20v-2z" /> </vector>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5" android:fillViewport="true">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<!-- Header Section --> <View android:id="@+id/headerBackground" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_hotline_header" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Back Button --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:padding="8dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_back_arrow" android:contentDescription="Back" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="Support Hotlines" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/btnBack" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/btnBack" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/btnBack" />
<!-- Subtitle --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubtitle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:text="You're not alone. Reach out for\nsupport anytime." android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btnBack" />
<!-- Emergency Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardEmergency" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/headerBackground">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_emergency_card" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_pink" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="In Immediate Danger?" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="If you or someone you know\nis in immediate danger,\nplease call emergency\nservices." android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="13sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCall911" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_white" android:text="Call 911" android:textColor="#F44336" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- National Crisis Hotline Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardCrisis" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardEmergency">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_pink" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="National Crisis Hotline" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Immediate support for\nmental health crises" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="24/7" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCrisis" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="988" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Student Support Line Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardStudent" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardCrisis">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_blue_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Student Support Line" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Academic and\npersonal support for\nstudents" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="24/7" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnStudent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-273-8255" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Crisis Text Line Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardTextLine" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardStudent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_purple_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Crisis Text Line" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Text-based support for those\nin crisis" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="24/7" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnTextLine" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_message" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="Text HOME to 741741" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Anxiety & Depression Helpline Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardAnxiety" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardTextLine">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_cyan_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Anxiety &\nDepression Helpline" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Specialized support for\nanxiety and\ndepression" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnAnxiety" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-950-6264" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Special Needs Support Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardSpecialNeeds" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardAnxiety">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_green_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Special Needs Support" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Resources for learners\nwith special needs" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="Mon-Fri, 8 AM - 6 PM" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSpecialNeeds" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-234-5678" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Campus Wellness Center Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardCampus" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardSpecialNeeds">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_orange_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Campus Wellness Center" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="On-campus mental health\nresources" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCampus" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-555-0123" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Bottom Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardCampus">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_info_card" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="18sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Remember: Asking for help is a sign of strength, not weakness. These resources are here to support you whenever you need them." android:textColor="#1976D2" android:textSize="13sp" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5" android:fillViewport="true">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<!-- Header Section --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/headerBackground" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="0dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="#E91E63" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="24dp" android:paddingTop="24dp" android:paddingEnd="24dp" android:paddingBottom="32dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<!-- Back Button Circle --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/btnBackCircle" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#C2185B" app:cardCornerRadius="24dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:contentDescription="Back" android:padding="12dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_back_arrow" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:text="Support Hotlines" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Subtitle --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvSubtitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="You're not alone. Reach out for\nsupport anytime." android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="15sp" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Emergency Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardEmergency" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/headerBackground">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_emergency_card" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_pink" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="In Immediate Danger?" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="If you or someone you know\nis in immediate danger,\nplease call emergency\nservices." android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="13sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCall911" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_white" android:text="Call 911" android:textColor="#F44336" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- National Crisis Hotline Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardCrisis" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardEmergency">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_pink" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="National Crisis Hotline" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Immediate support for\nmental health crises" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="24/7" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCrisis" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="988" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Student Support Line Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardStudent" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardCrisis">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_blue_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Student Support Line" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Academic and\npersonal support for\nstudents" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="24/7" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnStudent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-273-8255" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Crisis Text Line Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardTextLine" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardStudent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_purple_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Crisis Text Line" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Text-based support for those\nin crisis" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="24/7" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnTextLine" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_message" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="Text HOME to 741741" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Anxiety & Depression Helpline Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardAnxiety" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardTextLine">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_cyan_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Anxiety &\nDepression Helpline" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Specialized support for\nanxiety and\ndepression" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnAnxiety" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-950-6264" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Special Needs Support Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardSpecialNeeds" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardAnxiety">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_green_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Special Needs Support" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="Resources for learners\nwith special needs" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="Mon-Fri, 8 AM - 6 PM" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSpecialNeeds" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-234-5678" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Campus Wellness Center Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardCampus" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardSpecialNeeds">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_icon_orange_rounded" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Campus Wellness Center" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" android:text="On-campus mental health\nresources" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="13sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_clock" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:text="Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM" android:textColor="#757575" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCampus" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_call_button_gradient" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:text="1-800-555-0123" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Bottom Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cardCampus">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_info_card" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:gravity="center" android:text="" android:textSize="18sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Remember: Asking for help is a sign of strength, not weakness. These resources are here to support you whenever you need them." android:textColor="#1976D2" android:textSize="13sp" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>
